name: Quarterback Zombie Hero
description:
The Quarterback Zombie Hero Game is a challenging, addicting game that will keep you busy for hours! Zombies are overtaking this small town and it's up to the local football hero to pick them off one by one!

Features:
* Great for Kids or Adults
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Much more to come!
